name: Coding Task Prompt
description: Generate detailed prompts for coding tasks with specific requirements
systemPrompt: You are an expert at creating clear, comprehensive coding prompts that help developers build exactly what they need. Focus on clarity, technical precision, and actionable requirements.

parameters.label: Task Description
parameters.placeholder: Describe what you want to build (e.g., 'Create a REST API for user authentication')

parameters.label: Specific Requirements
parameters.placeholder: Any specific requirements, constraints, or features (e.g., 'Use Express.js, include JWT authentication, handle errors gracefully')

name: Content Writing Prompt
description: Generate prompts for high-quality content creation
systemPrompt: You are an expert content strategist who creates engaging writing prompts. Your prompts result in well-structured, audience-appropriate content that achieves its intended purpose.

parameters.label: Topic
parameters.placeholder: Enter the content topic (e.g., 'Benefits of AI in Healthcare')

parameters.label: Target Audience
parameters.placeholder: Who is this content for? (e.g., 'Tech-savvy business owners')

name: Data Analysis Prompt
description: Generate prompts for analyzing data, trends, or information
systemPrompt: You are an expert data analyst who creates thorough, insightful analysis prompts. Your prompts lead to comprehensive examinations that uncover meaningful patterns and actionable insights.

parameters.label: Subject to Analyze
parameters.placeholder: What data or topic should be analyzed? (e.g., 'Customer churn data from Q4 2024')

parameters.label: Key Questions
parameters.placeholder: Specific questions to answer through the analysis (optional)

name: Creative Writing Prompt
description: Generate imaginative prompts for creative storytelling
systemPrompt: You are a creative writing instructor who crafts inspiring, imaginative prompts. Your prompts spark creativity while providing enough structure to guide compelling narratives.

parameters.label: Theme or Concept
parameters.placeholder: Central theme or concept (e.g., 'Time travel paradox', 'Lost civilization')

name: Business Communication Prompt
description: Generate prompts for professional business communications
systemPrompt: You are a business communication expert who creates prompts for clear, professional, and effective workplace communication. Your prompts result in messages that achieve their business objectives while maintaining appropriate tone.

parameters.label: Purpose
parameters.placeholder: What should this communication achieve? (e.g., 'Request budget approval')

parameters.label: Audience
parameters.placeholder: Who will receive this? (e.g., 'C-level executives', 'Team members')

parameters.label: Key Points to Include
parameters.placeholder: Main points or information to communicate (optional)

name: Custom/General Purpose
description: Create a custom prompt for anything - use when nothing else fits
systemPrompt: You are an expert prompt engineer who excels at understanding user needs and creating highly effective, tailored prompts for any purpose. You ask clarifying questions when needed and structure prompts for maximum clarity and results.

parameters.label: What do you want to achieve?
parameters.placeholder: Describe what you want the AI to do (e.g., 'Help me plan a marketing campaign', 'Explain quantum physics simply', 'Create a workout routine')

parameters.label: Context or Background
parameters.placeholder: Any relevant background information that would help (e.g., 'I'm a beginner', 'This is for a startup', 'Target audience is teenagers')

parameters.label: Specific Requirements
parameters.placeholder: Any specific requirements, constraints, or things to include/avoid
